Title: The World Is Yours
Writer: Karim Boukercha (adaptation), Karim Boukercha (screenplay), Noé Debré (adaptation), Noé Debré (screenplay), Romain Gavras (adaptation), Romain Gavras (screenplay)
Actors: Karim Leklou, Isabelle Adjani, Vincent Cassel, Oulaya Amamra
Plot: A small-time dealer dreams of another life but can't afford it. To escape, he must accept one last job involving Spain, drugs, the Illuminati and his overbearing mother.
